metaDescription: Technology partner for businesses that want to move forward.
heroTitle: Turning Ideas Into Solutions That Drive Results
heroSubtitle: I partner with companies to solve real problems through technology, from discovery and strategy to building products that create tangible impact.
aboutShortText: A software engineer with over 10 years in software development and more than 15 years in the broader tech field. Passionate about using technology as a tool for business impact. Not just writing code, but solving problems that matter.
aboutHowText: I get involved early and stay close to the problem. That means understanding the business context, mapping out opportunities, and working alongside teams to shape the right solution. From first concept to production, I bring both strategic thinking and hands-on execution.
aboutDrivesText: Building things that create real value. I believe the best technology solutions come from deeply understanding the problem, not from jumping straight to code. Every engagement is an opportunity to help a business move forward.
approachDiscoveryText: Understanding your business context, identifying opportunities, and defining the right path forward.
approachIdeaText: Building proofs of concept and MVPs, iterating fast, and shaping solutions from the ground up.
approachBeyondText: Contributing to defining and structuring the solution. Not just building what's asked, but what's needed.
servicesDiscoveryText: Mapping your business challenges to technology opportunities. I help define what to build and why, before writing a single line of code.
servicesMvpText: Validating ideas quickly with focused prototypes. Get early feedback, reduce risk, and build confidence before scaling.
servicesProductText: End-to-end development of software products, from architecture to delivery. Built to last, designed to evolve.
servicesLeadershipText: Strategic guidance for your technology decisions. Architecture reviews, team mentoring, and hands-on support when you need it most.
contactSubtitle: Want to work together or just say hello? Send a message or reach out on social media.

formSuccessText: Thanks for reaching out. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
